Before you start

A guide to testing

Testing the Submit an application to change the land register API

HMLR does not currently provide a test environment for the Submit an application to change the land register API. Instead, we’ve provided example code to demonstrate what you should expect to see when developing your own services.

You’ll find test stub examples on API pages and example request and response code in the API technical guides.

For additional support, contact our integration support team.

Testing SOAP and REST APIs

Information about testing SOAP and REST APIs will be added at a later date.

We sometimes use technical terms to describe the work we do at HMLR. For a list of commonly used terms and their definitions, visit our glossary.
